forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Heavy rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 42F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 33F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 39F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 2C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 35F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. High 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 7C. E winds shifting to SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High around 45F. E winds shifting to SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low around 5C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 43F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 47F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 2C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 36F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 5C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High around 40F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 33F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High near 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 40F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early transitioning to snow showers late. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening changing to snow showers overnight. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low 29F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Snow showers overnight. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Snow showers overnight. Low 27F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
